description:
If you are an intermediate level guitar player and would love to learn the unique style of Dan Fogelberg, this is the perfect course for you. The course carefully breaks down 9 popular Dan Fogelberg songs with demonstration of song structure and both left and right-hand technique that gave Fogelberg his unique and beloved style. I both show and explain in detail all you need to practice yourself to perfection!

Master a number of Dan Fogelberg's most popular songs. 

At the end of the course you will be able to: 

*Learn 9 of Dan Fogelberg's most beloved songs:

   *Longer

   *The Reach

   *Leader of the Band

   *Hard to Say

   *There's a Place in the World for A Gambler

   *Go Down Easy

   *Looking for a Lady

   *Old Tennessee

   *Make Love Stay

*Understand and have clear demonstration of his unique left and right hand techniques. 

I designed this course for intermediate level acoustic guitar players who want to expand their skills and enjoy playing the songs of one of the most accomplished and beloved singer/songwriters of the 70's and 80's.  The course is taught using multi-screen video to give clear demonstration of both right and left hand techniques.
title: How to Play Dan Fogelberg Songs on Guitar
